stories.text:
I want to donate to the Ukrainian war effort. All the posts about how to help suggest donating to refugee and medical efforts. This is a noble way to contribute, but I want to contribute more directly to the resistance on the ground.

Is there a straightforward way to donate money directly to the Ukrainian military? Or a way of helping the Ukrainian economy (like an ETF of Ukrainian bonds)?
stories.title: Ask HN: How can I donate bullets?

Impact of Sanctions on Russia and Belarus

stories.text:
I'm an aspiring artist who has fond memories of rain and the monsoon season.

As an artist I always wanted to document or represent the feeling of monsoons through a visual medium.

Any great ideas or thoughts to do this?

Last year I tried recording rain sounds through a microphone and played it on a speaker with paint on it. But the frequency was not strong enough to produce any interesting patters.

Any other suggestions would be appreciated!
stories.title: Ask HN: How to Visualize Sound?
